name: avant-garde lamp
description: Brighten your space with this sleek and modern lamp, perfect for adding warmth and charm to any room. Its soft glow creates a relaxing atmosphere for work or leisure.

name: chic chair
description: Sink into the ultimate relaxation with our plush lazy chair, designed for all-day comfort and modern style. Whether you're reading, napping, or just lounging, this chair offers the perfect cozy retreat.

name: comfy bed
description: Experience restful nights on our comfy bed, combining cozy cushioning with sturdy craftsmanship. Drift off with ease and wake up refreshed, ready to take on the day.
